element.text1: Up to 10 teraflops of processing power enables in-car gaming on-par with todayâ€™s newest consoles. Wireless controller compatibility lets you game from any seat.
element.text2: Multi-device Bluetooth, wireless and USB-C charging for every passenger, with enough power to fast-charge your tablets and laptop.

element.text1: A 22-speaker, 960-watt audio system with active noise canceling offers the best listening experience at home or on the road.
element.text2: With front and rear trunks and fold-flat seats, Model S is a luxury car where you can fit your bike without taking the wheel off, and your luggage too.
